TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit ZipFileExtensions extends System.Object
public ref class ZipFileExtensions abstract sealed

summary.span: 为 和 类提供扩展方法。

span.span: Provides extension methods for the and classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类仅包含静态方法，扩展和类。The class contains only static methods that extend the and classes. 不创建的实例类; 相反，使用这些方法的实例从或。You do not create an instance of the class; instead, you use these methods from instances of or . 若要使用的扩展方法，则必须引用`System.IO.Compression.FileSystem`项目中的程序集。To use the extension methods, you must reference the `System.IO.Compression.FileSystem` assembly in your project. `System.IO.Compression.FileSystem`程序集不位于[!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)]应用。The `System.IO.Compression.FileSystem` assembly is not available in [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] apps. 因此，和类 (这两种位于`System.IO.Compression.FileSystem`程序集) 中均不提供[!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)]应用。Therefore, the and classes (both of which are in the `System.IO.Compression.FileSystem` assembly) are not available in [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] apps. 在[!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)]应用，你使用压缩文件通过使用中的方法， ， ，和。In [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] apps, you work with compressed files by using the methods in , , , and . 类包含三个方法的扩展:The class contains three methods that extend : - - - 类包含两种方法的扩展:The class contains two methods that extend : - - ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何从现有的文件，在 zip 存档中创建新的条目并提取到目录存档的内容。The following example shows how to create a new entry in a zip archive from an existing file, and extract the contents of the archive to a directory. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchive/cs/program3.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchive/vb/program3.vb#3)] 下面的示例演示如何循环访问的 zip 存档的内容并提取扩展名为.txt 的文件。The following example shows how to iterate through the contents of a zip archive and extract files that have a .txt extension. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchive/cs/program1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchive/vb/program1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 通过压缩并将其添加到邮编存档的存档文件。

span.span: Archives a file by compressing it and adding it to the zip archive.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveEntry CreateEntryFromFile (this System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive destination, string sourceFileName, string entryName);

.method public static hidebysig class System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveEntry CreateEntryFromFile(class System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive destination, string sourceFileName, string entryName) cil managed
<Extension()> Public Function CreateEntryFromFile (destination As ZipArchive, sourceFileName As String, entryName As String) As ZipArchiveEntry

param.name: destination
param.span: 要添加该文件的 zip 存档。

span.span: The zip archive to add the file to.

param.name: sourceFileName
param.span: 待存档的文件的路径。

span.span: The path to the file to be archived.

param.span: 可以指定相对或绝对路径。

span.span: You can specify either a relative or an absolute path.

param.span: 相对路径是指相对于当前工作目录的路径。

span.span: A relative path is interpreted as relative to the current working directory.

param.name: entryName
param.span: 要在 zip 存档中生成的输入的名称。

span.span: The name of the entry to create in the zip archive.

summary.span: 通过压缩并将其添加到邮编存档的存档文件。

span.span: Archives a file by compressing it and adding it to the zip archive.

returns.span: zip 存档中新项的包装。

span.span: A wrapper for the new entry in the zip archive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 存档中的新项包含指定的文件的内容`sourceFileName`。The new entry in the archive contains the contents of the file specified by `sourceFileName`. 如果具有指定名称的条目 (`entryName`) 已存在的存档中的第二个项创建具有相同的名称。If an entry with the specified name (`entryName`) already exists in the archive, a second entry is created with an identical name. 的项的属性设置为文件系统上的文件已更改的最后一个时间。The property of the entry is set to the last time the file on the file system was changed. 当`ZipArchiveMode.Update`存在，一个条目的大小限制仅限于。When `ZipArchiveMode.Update` is present, the size limit of an entry is limited to . 此限制是因为更新模式使用内部以允许查找所需更新存档时和具有最大 int 的大小等于This limit is because update mode uses a internally to allow the seeking required when updating an archive, and has a maximum equal to the size of an int. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何从现有的文件在 zip 存档中创建新的条目。The following example shows how to create a new entry in a zip archive from an existing file. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchive/cs/program3.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchive/vb/program3.vb#3)]

exception.span: 例如，在基于 Windows 的平台上，路径长度不得超过 248 个字符，文件名长度不得超过 260 个字符。

span.span: For example, on Windows-based platforms, paths must not exceed 248 characters, and file names must not exceed 260 characters.

exception.span: 无效（例如，它位于未映射的驱动器上）。

MemberSignature.Value: public static void ExtractToDirectory (this System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive source, string destinationDirectoryName);
.method public static hidebysig void ExtractToDirectory(class System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive source, string destinationDirectoryName) cil managed
<Extension()> Public Sub ExtractToDirectory (source As ZipArchive, destinationDirectoryName As String)

param.name: source
param.span: 从中提取文件的 zip 存档。

span.span: The zip archive to extract files from.

param.name: destinationDirectoryName
param.span: 要在其中放置解压缩的文件的目录路径。

span.span: The path to the directory to place the extracted files in.

param.span: 可以指定相对或绝对路径。

span.span: You can specify either a relative or an absolute path.

param.span: 相对路径是指相对于当前工作目录的路径。

span.span: A relative path is interpreted as relative to the current working directory.

summary.span: 将 zip 存档中的所有文件都解压缩到文件系统的一个目录下。

span.span: Extracts all the files in the zip archive to a directory on the file system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法创建指定的目录`destinationDirectoryName`。This method creates the directory specified by `destinationDirectoryName`. 如果目标目录已存在，此方法不会覆盖它;它将引发异常。If the destination directory already exists, this method does not overwrite it; it throws an exception. 该方法还将创建反映 zip 存档中的层次结构的子目录。The method also creates subdirectories that reflect the hierarchy in the zip archive. 如果提取过程中发生错误，保留部分提取存档。If an error occurs during extraction, the archive remains partially extracted. 每个提取的文件具有指定的目录的同一相对路径`destinationDirectoryName`作为其源项均具有到存档的根。Each extracted file has the same relative path to the directory specified by `destinationDirectoryName` as its source entry has to the root of the archive. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何从现有的文件，在 zip 存档中创建新的条目和存档解压缩到新目录。The following example shows how to create a new entry in a zip archive from an existing file, and extract the archive to a new directory. 到编译器的顺序此代码示例中，你必须引用`System.IO.Compression`和`System.IO.Compression.FileSystem`你的项目中的程序集。In order to compiler this code example, you must reference the `System.IO.Compression` and `System.IO.Compression.FileSystem` assemblies in your project. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchive/cs/program3.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchive/vb/program3.vb#3)]

span.span: The name of an entry in the archive is , contains only white space, or contains at least one invalid character.

exception.span: 或

span.span: -or-

exception.span: 从存档中解压缩一个条目将在 指定的目录之外创建一个文件。

span.span: Extracting an entry from the archive would create a file that is outside the directory specified by .

exception.span: （例如，如果条目名中包含父目录访问器，则可能发生这种情况。）

span.span: (For example, this might happen if the entry name contains parent directory accessors.)

exception.span: 或

span.span: -or-

exception.span: 存档中的两个或多个条目名相同。

span.span: Two or more entries in the archive have the same name.

exception.span: 调用方没有写入目标目录所需的权限。

span.span: The caller does not have the required permission to write to the destination directory.

exception.span: 包含无效的格式。

span.span: contains an invalid format.

exception.span: 存档条目无法找到或已损坏。

span.span: An archive entry cannot be found or is corrupt.

exception.span: 或

span.span: -or-

exception.span: 使用了一种不支持的压缩方法压缩存档条目。

span.span: An archive entry was compressed by using a compression method that is not supported.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void ExtractToFile (this System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveEntry source, string destinationFileName);
.method public static hidebysig void ExtractToFile(class System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveEntry source, string destinationFileName) cil managed
<Extension()> Public Sub ExtractToFile (source As ZipArchiveEntry, destinationFileName As String)

param.name: source
param.span: 要从其中解压缩文件的 zip 存档条目。

span.span: The zip archive entry to extract a file from.

param.name: destinationFileName
param.span: 从条目内容创建的文件的路径。

span.span: The path of the file to create from the contents of the entry.

param.span: 可以指定相对或绝对路径。

span.span: You can specify either a relative or an absolute path.

param.span: 相对路径是指相对于当前工作目录的路径。

span.span: A relative path is interpreted as relative to the current working directory.

summary.span: 将 zip 存档中的条目解压到文件下。

span.span: Extracts an entry in the zip archive to a file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果目标文件已存在，此方法不会覆盖它;它将引发异常。If the destination file already exists, this method does not overwrite it; it throws an exception. 若要覆盖现有文件，使用方法重载。To overwrite an existing file, use the method overload instead. 该文件的上次写入时间设置为上次更改 zip 存档中的项;此值存储在属性。The last write time of the file is set to the last time the entry in the zip archive was changed; this value is stored in the property. 你无法使用此方法提取目录;使用方法相反。You cannot use this method to extract a directory; use the method instead. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何循环访问 zip 存档文件的内容并提取扩展名为.txt 的文件。The following example shows how to iterate through the contents of a zip archive file and extract files that have a .txt extension. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchive/cs/program1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchive/vb/program1.vb#1)]

<Extension()> Public Sub ExtractToFile (source As ZipArchiveEntry, destinationFileName As String, overwrite As Boolean)

param.name: source
param.span: 要从其中解压缩文件的 zip 存档条目。

span.span: The zip archive entry to extract a file from.

param.name: destinationFileName
param.span: 从条目内容创建的文件的路径。

span.span: The path of the file to create from the contents of the entry.

param.span: 可以指定相对或绝对路径。

span.span: You can specify either a relative or an absolute path.

param.span: 相对路径是指相对于当前工作目录的路径。

span.span: A relative path is interpreted as relative to the current working directory.

param.name: overwrite
param.span: 如果覆盖与目标文件同名的现有文件，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: to overwrite an existing file that has the same name as the destination file; otherwise, .

summary.span: 将 zip 存档中的条目解压缩到文件下，并可选择覆盖具有相同名称的现有文件。

span.span: Extracts an entry in the zip archive to a file, and optionally overwrites an existing file that has the same name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 该文件的上次写入时间设置为上次更改 zip 存档中的项;此值存储在属性。The last write time of the file is set to the last time the entry in the zip archive was changed; this value is stored in the property. 你无法使用此方法提取目录;使用方法相反。You cannot use this method to extract a directory; use the method instead. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何循环访问的 zip 存档文件中，内容并提取扩展名为.txt 的文件。The following example shows how to iterate through the contents of a zip archive file, and extract files that have a .txt extension. 它将覆盖现有文件的目标文件夹中具有相同的名称。It overwrites an existing file that has the same name in the destination folder. 到编译器的顺序此代码示例中，你必须引用`System.IO.Compression`和`System.IO.Compression.FileSystem`你的项目中的程序集。In order to compiler this code example, you must reference the `System.IO.Compression` and `System.IO.Compression.FileSystem` assemblies in your project. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchive/cs/program2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchive/vb/program2.vb#2)]

exception.span: 是一个长度为零的字符串，仅包含空格，或包含一个或多个由 定义的无效字符。

span.span: is a zero-length string, contains only white space, or contains one or more invalid characters as defined by .

exception.span: 指定目录。

span.span: specifies a directory.

exception.span: 为 。

exception.span: 指定的路径和/或文件名超过了系统定义的最大长度。

span.span: The specified path, file name, or both exceed the system-defined maximum length.

exception.span: 例如，在基于 Windows 的平台上，路径长度不得超过 248 个字符，文件名长度不得超过 260 个字符。

span.span: For example, on Windows-based platforms, paths must not exceed 248 characters, and file names must not exceed 260 characters.

exception.span: 指定的路径无效（例如，它位于未映射的驱动器上）。

span.span: The specified path is invalid (for example, it is on an unmapped drive).

exception.span: 已存在，且 是 。

span.span: already exists and is .

span.span: An I/O error occurred.

exception.span: 或

exception.span: 该条目当前处于打开状态，可以写入。

span.span: The entry is currently open for writing.

exception.span: 或

span.span: -or-

exception.span: 该条目已从存档中删除。

span.span: The entry has been deleted from the archive.

exception.span: 调用方没有创建新文件所需的权限。

span.span: The caller does not have the required permission to create the new file.

exception.span: 存档中缺少该条目，或者该条目已损坏且无法读取。

span.span: The entry is missing from the archive or is corrupt and cannot be read.

exception.span: 或

exception.span: 已经通过使用一种不受支持的压缩方法压缩该条目。

span.span: The entry has been compressed by using a compression method that is not supported.

exception.span: 已释放该条目所属的 zip 存档。

span.span: The zip archive that this entry belongs to has been disposed.

exception.span: 的格式无效。

span.span: is in an invalid format.

exception.span: 或

exception.span: 该条目的 zip 存档是在 模式中打开的，不允许检索条目。

span.span: The zip archive for this entry was opened in mode, which does not permit the retrieval of entries.
